amendment.description: To increase the appropriation for rural decentralized water systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1143 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6311) To increase the appropriation for rural decentralized water systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1143 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1143 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Jones to Amendment SA 948.
